content: As a city slicker from New York, I wasn't expecting much from the Seoul Grand Park, but boy was I proven wrong! 😲 This place is an absolute gem, a lush green oasis right in the heart of the bustling city. From the moment I stepped through the gates, it felt like I had been transported to a magical wonderland. 🌳✨ The park is massive, with towering trees, winding trails, and even a little stream that babbles away cheerfully. I spent hours just wandering around, taking in the sights and sounds of nature. But the real highlight? The animal attractions! 🦒🐘🦁 The zoo section is top-notch, with enclosures that mimic the animals' natural habitats. I even got to witness a lion let out a mighty roar – talk about an adrenaline rush! 🦁And let's not forget the rides! 🎢 The Seoul Grand Park has its very own amusement park section, complete with rollercoasters, carousels, and all sorts of whimsical attractions that brought out the kid in me.If you find yourself in Seoul, do yourself a favor and carve out a day (or two!) to explore this urban oasis. Trust me, it's worth it! 🌴😎
An interesting place for you to take your baby to experience. You will be able to observe the animals that she can only see through the TV

Yuewei Island was once an island about 1 kilometer from the Qianhai of Incheon, and gradually became connected with land during road construction. The name of Yuewei Island comes from the shape of a half-moon-tailed island. Yuewei Island is not far from Seoul and has convenient transportation. Tourists often come here for sightseeing on weekends. There are more than 50 sashimi shops on the island, elaborately making delicious seafood for tourists. From Yuewei Island, you can take a cruise boat around the beautiful scenery at any time. The cool sea breeze, the clear water of the West Sea, and the gulls hovering over the sky make people intoxicated. Coming to the cool seaside and forgetting the fatigue of urban life, Yuewei Island Seaside Cultural Street holds a celebration at the end of the month every year. Our car also boarded the boat. Many seagulls surrounded us on the sea. They were brave enough to come and grab food with their hands. It was rare to hear the calls of seagulls so close to the seagulls. They circled around us and flew low and fell on the sea. After going to the island, they saw amusement parks, restaurants, shops and landmark buildings. And so on.
